_header: Christ that died on the rood
Bibliographic Ghosts:
Worcester, Worcester Cathedral Library F.19: not in this MS; OxfLin52: See Wenzel (1978)
XWenzel, Siegfried. Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle English Poems. Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978, 202-3.
_description: A tag in the Fasciculus morum — one couplet freely translating 1 Cor. 5.7.

Bod187.Transcription:
Cryst þat deyd on þe rodeHe ys owre lomb and ester
                    fode

Bod332.Transcription:
Crist þat died opon þe rodeis our lambe our ester
                    fode

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
Cryste þat dyed on þe rodeys oure lomb oure aster
                    fode

BodLauMis568.Transcription:
Criste þat dyed on þe rodees oure lombe & estyr
                    fode

OxfCCC218.Transcription:
Cryst þat deide on [þe] rode[Is] owre lombe & ester
                    fode
OxfCCC218.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 202.

CamGon71.Transcription:
Chryst þat dyed vp on þe rodeys oure lomb oure estre
                    fode

EDU82.Transcription: Cryste that dyed on the rodeYs owre lombe and estyr foode

Spalding.Transcription: Cryst that dyed on the roodis our lambe and offerd food
